entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-09-26
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Maui for ios RTL modes problem with ScrollView #17674
  • AbsoluteLayout has slightly different behavior in Maui (than in Forms) #17673
  • Tab text color doesn't update correctly when adding/removing tabs via hot reload #17668
  • Sensors - OrientationSensor, Accelerometer - result NAN #17666
    .NET 7 + Servicing
  • [iOS/Mac] CollectionView ItemsViewScrolledEventArgs are incorrect when IsGrouped = true #17664
  • Label in View contained in FlexLayout does not wrap #17658
  • Entry's SelectionLength property is not updating initially on Android, Mac and iOS platforms. #17657
  • Grid Layout Child Elements Not Taking Full Width of the Screen #17654
  • [regression] Path element inside Grid is cropped in .NET 7. #17652
    .NET 7 + Servicing
  • [Android] Images from URLs are not rendered if you do not specify a fixed size #17651
  • problem with .NET MAUI #17650
  • MAUI Android projects generate an \obj\Debug\net6.0-android\Resource.designer.cs file containing code that ends in 12k+ CS0131 Errors #17646
  • [regression/8.0.0] [Android] "SwipeItem" "CommandParameter" fails to bind as null in the CollectionView #17644
    .NET 8 GA
  • Grid is not aligned center in .NET 7 #17643
    .NET 7 + Servicing
  • [regression/8.0.0] Button Click Ripple Effect Not Working In Android #17642
    .NET 8 GA
  • Background color of every tab in tabbar of a Shell #17641

Closed

  • Dotnet/maui#17662 #17662
  • Dontnet/maui #17661
  • Xaml Compiler NullRef with Grid.Resources #10583
    Under Consideration
  • Shell.FlyoutContent does not update with hot reload (most likely an SDK issue) #9080
    Under Consideration
  • Border background is wrong by default on Android and text cannot be seen (it's correct on Windows) #16547
    Backlog
  • [Android] Border default background is black #17547
    .NET 8 GA
  • PopupPage: Screen goes black outside frame on iOS #15230
  • Add AddWebAllowedObject extension method for Webview2 #17653
  • Triggers doesn't work on appearing #17355
  • Will `PointerPressed` be supported as a visual state in .NET 8? #17632
  • MAUIG1001 An error occured while parsing Xaml: Unexpected XML declaration. Can't build the project. #17638
  • CollectionView crashes/behaves weird when ObservableCollection updated quickly #7237
    .NET 8 + Servicing
  • RadioButton GroupName and IsChecked properties work inconsistently on Windows #7595
  • Incorrect Labels Margin in Grid when the Margin is Small #17408
  • AndroidNativeLibrary not getting picked in `Release` mode. #17497

PullRequests

Created

  • Log test start/stop times #17675
    area/testing
  • Can template tests run in parallel? #17672
    do-not-merge, area/templates 📄
  • `sealed` some `internal` classes in `Controls.Core` that are not inherited from (2) #17671
    community ✨
  • iOS Keyboard Scrolling Improvements and UITests (not from fork) #17670
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, control-entry, area/keyboard, Under Consideration
  • `sealed` some `internal` classes in `Controls.Core` that are not inherited from (1) #17669
    community ✨
  • Remove obsolete MauiWinUIApplication properties #17667
    .NET 8 GA
  • Wrap Image with a container on Windows so that it is centered with AspectFill #17665
    area/image :framed_picture:, .NET 8 + Servicing
  • [Windows] Fix wrong Layout from hidden CollectionView #17659
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/collectionview 📃
  • [C] Lowest specificity for propagated values #17648
  • [Android] Fix RefreshView loading indicador position #17647
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-refreshview
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #17640
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • ScrollView content needs layout when ScrollView.InvalidateMeasure is called #17639
    area/layout 🔲, partner/hot-reload-xaml

Merged

  • [net7.0] Update SkiaSharp to 2.88.6 #17663
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Fix iOS/Win InputTransparent layouts and add several UI tests #17286
    Under Consideration
  • Enable .NET 7 <MauiVersion> to work in .NET 8 SDK projects #17409
    .NET 8 GA
  • [net8.0] Merge main to net8 #17649
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, .NET 8 GA
  • [XamlC] fix generic array #17301
    area/Xaml </>, Under Consideration
  • Update Flyout when Shell.FlyoutContent changes #17359
    area/shell 🐢, partner/hot-reload-xaml, .NET 8 GA
  • Fixed Android's Border background to use a Transparent bg if not othe… #17555
    area/controls 🎮, .NET 8 GA
  • Fix typo in build.sh #17305
    area/infrastructure 🏗️, community ✨, stale
  • Bump the xunit group with 3 updates #17619
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • If NavigationRenderer is Disposed don't UpdateFrames #17544

Updated

  • Make ALL template warnings show up as test errors (not just C# warnings), and produce more diagnostic artifacts #17637
    area/templates 📄
  • [Windows] Allow tap gesture in ContentView #17482
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/gestures, Under Consideration
  • [Android] Fix ReturnType on Entry #17546
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-entry
  • Fix accent color missing in title bar #17528
    platform/windows 🪟, area/desktop 🖥️, control-window, .NET 8 GA
  • [Windows] Fix tab colors not updating on add/remove #17591
    platform/windows 🪟, area/shell 🐢, area/desktop 🖥️, .NET 8 + Servicing
  • Resizetizer issues fixes - nuget bumps #16100
    area/single project ☝️, Under Consideration
  • [Android] Fix ScrollView filling layouts #17243
    area/layout 🔲, platform/android 🤖, layout-scrollview, Under Consideration
  • [net8.0] Build the previous TFM for Essentials & Graphics #17042
    .NET 8 GA
  • (Windows) ImageButton contents now explicitly stretches #17159
    platform/windows 🪟, area/image :framed_picture:, area/controls 🎮, control-button, stale, Under Consideration
  • Bump the windowsappsdk group with 1 update #17509
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Bump the androidx group with 14 updates #17401
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget, .NET 8 GA
  • [net7.0] 20230912 Android Ecosystem updates AndroidX #17318
    .NET 7 + Servicing
  • Fix some of the false GC test failures in Debug mode #17596
  • Grid rows ios fix #17199
    area/layout 🔲, community ✨, stale, .NET 8 GA
  • Add border visual tests #17633
